LanguageData.WanderConfusedCore.label: confused wandering
LanguageData.WanderConfusedCore.beginLetter: {0}'s mind is being flooded with terrible pictures and sounds by the AI persona core.

LanguageData.BerserkCore.label: AI takeover
LanguageData.BerserkCore.beginLetter: {0}'s AI persona core has assumed direct control!\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] will attack anyone [PAWN_pronoun] sees.
